name: @olympo/react-html-tags
description: Type-safe React components for all HTML tags with full native attribute support

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --external react --external react/jsx-runtime --external react/jsx-dev-runtime && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationDir dist
scripts.build:check-size: du -h dist/index.js && echo 'Gzipped size:' && gzip -c dist/index.js | wc -c | awk '{printf "%.2f KB\n", $1/1024}'
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run build:check-size
